Subject: Relation between CrawlController.maxToeThreads and BdBModule.expectedConcurrency

Hello,

While reading the default H3 configuration I stumbled upon the expe=
ctedConcurrency property of BdBModule.

The default value is 25 and the doc=
umentation refers to oracle's one stating :

<< On the other end of the spe=
ctrum is the je.lock.nLockTables property, which can specify the number of =
lock tables. While the default is 1, increasing this number can improve mul=
tithreaded concurrency. The value of this property should be a prime number=
, and should ideally be the nearest prime that is not greater than the numb=
er of concurrent threads. >>

At first, I thought that the best value shoul=
d be the prime number just below maxToeThreads but is that really the case?=
 I would guess that the number of concurrent threads (from the database's p=
oint of view) is lower.

I would be glad to hear about your experiences and=
 advises about the tuning of this parameter.

Thanks in advance

Bertrand D=
echoux
